name: Tic Tac Bros
description:
An arrow will move up and down in front of your bro for the direction of the toss, click and hold the left mouse button once you've aimed your shot. Continue holding the mouse button and a power bar will appear. Release the button at your desired power to shoot your shot.

Tic Tac Toe slots can be stolen up to two times. Once a third X or O lands in a slot, it will turn red, meaning it's locked and cannot be taken.

We plan to convert this to a mobile online 1v1 format on iOS and Android. This is what we have for the time being.
